item.title: 越南中央银行重申出售美元计划以支持越南盾
item.description: 越南货币当局重申，计划继续向一些银行出售美元，以此干预外汇市场，支持已跌至历史最低点的本币。【原文：Vietnam’s monetary authority reiterated its plan to keep selling dollars to some banks as a way of intervening in the foreign exchange market to support the local currency, which has fallen to a record low.】

item.title: 马克龙访华考验法德关系：看点
item.description: 法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙（Emmanuel Macron）将于周日前往德国进行为期三天的国事访问，这将是对欧盟核心国家制定欧盟议程能力的一次考验，而此时距离可能发生的激烈选举仅有两周时间。【原文：French President Emmanuel Macron heads to Germany for a three-day state visit on Sunday that will test the ability of the European Union’s core couple to set the bloc’s agenda just two weeks before potentially bruising elections.】

item.title: 夏威夷电力公司就火灾责任向茂宜岛县发起罢工
item.description: 夏威夷电气工业公司（Hawaiian Electric Industries Inc.【原文：Hawaiian Electric Industries Inc. says it isn’t legally responsible for the devastating fire last year that razed the historic town of Lahaina — it was Maui County’s fault.】

item.title: 2024 年首场风暴来袭，菲律宾做好洪水准备
item.description: 菲律宾警告说，由于热带低气压 "阿洪 "周六登陆菲律宾群岛，并有可能在离开这个东南亚国家之前加强为台风，菲律宾将面临强降雨和强风的袭击。【原文：The Philippines has warned of heavy rainfall and strong winds hitting the archipelago as Tropical Depression Aghon made landfall on Saturday, and threatened to intensify into a typhoon before leaving the Southeast Asian nation.】

item.title: 美国因担心禽流感限制进口部分澳大利亚家禽
item.description: 在发现禽流感疫情后，美国农业部已禁止从澳大利亚维多利亚州进口部分家禽产品。【原文：The US Department of Agriculture has banned imports of some poultry products from Australia’s Victoria state after the detection of an outbreak of avian flu.】

item.title: 台湾地位为何有可能引发中美冲突
item.description: 台湾富裕、民主，位于中国沿海的战略要地，长期以来一直是中美之间最不稳定的问题。双方都避免了严重的冲突，因为谁才是台湾岛的真正主人这个问题一直悬而未决。但随着中国军方在被习近平主席视为失地的台湾附近加紧演习，这个问题越来越难以避免。挡路的是美国太平洋舰队和台湾选民。【原文：Wealthy, democratic and strategically located off the Chinese coast, Taiwan has long been the most volatile issue between the US and China. Both sides have avoided serious conflict by leaving unsettled the question of who actually owns the island. But it’s becoming harder to avoid as China’s military ratchets up exercises near what President Xi Jinping views as his country’s lost territory. Standing in the way are the US Pacific Fleet and Taiwanese voters, who have emphatically rejected closer t】

item.title: 美国延长对芯片齿轮制造商应用材料公司的调查
item.description: 美国商务部正在继续调查应用材料公司（Applied Materials Inc.【原文：The US Department of Commerce is continuing an investigation into Applied Materials Inc.’s shipments to Chinese customers, part of a broader effort to ensure that increasingly strict trade restrictions against the Asian nation are effective.】

item.title: 千禧年要求魏斯在交易谈判中裁员并驱逐客户
item.description: 千禧年管理公司（Millennium Management）要求韦斯多策略顾问公司（Weiss Multi-Strategy Advisers）做出一系列重大改变，作为接管这家陷入困境的对冲基金的谈判失败的一部分，这些改变包括解雇除五名投资组合经理以外的所有投资组合经理、裁减公司的核心员工以及踢出客户现金。【原文：Millennium Management demanded a number of significant changes at Weiss Multi-Strategy Advisers as part of failed talks to take over the troubled hedge fund, including firing all but five portfolio managers, winding down the firm’s core staff and kicking out client cash.】

item.title: 业主阿德勒与债券持有人达成债务重组协议
item.description: 德国房东阿德勒集团（Adler Group SA）已与大多数债券持有人达成协议，为陷入困境的公司进行债务再融资并注入更多流动资金，这将是该公司在过去两年中进行的第二次债务重组。【原文：German landlord Adler Group SA has struck a deal with a majority of bondholders to refinance debt and inject more liquidity to the embattled company in what would be its second debt overhaul in the past two years.】

item.title: 下一篇 英国政府面临 70 年来最严峻的财政挑战
item.description: 英国财政研究所（Institute for Fiscal Studies）智库表示，在即将到来的竞选活动中，英国各政党都需要坦诚面对下届政府所面临的痛苦的财政选择。【原文：All UK political parties need to be honest about the painful fiscal choices facing the next government during the coming election campaign, the Institute for Fiscal Studies think tank said.】

item.title: 奥特曼支持的 Oklo 公司认为数据中心将促进核能需求
item.description: 在宣布为一家数据中心提供核能的交易一天后，Oklo 公司表示，预计将与电力需求旺盛的行业签订更多合同。【原文：A day after announcing a deal to provide nuclear energy to a data center, Oklo Inc. says it expects to sign additional contracts from the power-hungry industry.】

item.title: 中国对外汇交易团伙的突袭表明加密货币禁令受到蔑视
item.description: 尽管中国政府禁止数字资产交易，但中国警方为阻止数十亿美元的非法外汇交易而采取的突袭行动凸显了加密货币在中国的持续使用。【原文：Police raids in China to stem billions of dollars in illicit foreign-exchange transactions have highlighted the continuing use of cryptocurrencies there despite Beijing’s prohibition of digital-asset trading.】

item.title: 看跌交易在华尔街高动量反弹中迅速崩溃
item.description: 每过一周，华尔街的熊市都会证明对少数有胆识的交易员来说太有诱惑力了。【原文：With each passing week, the bear case for Wall Street proves too tempting to pass up for a handful of gutsy traders.】

item.title: GameStop 通过出售股票筹集近 10 亿美元后大幅上涨
item.description: GameStop 公司的股票在尾盘交易中上涨，因为这家零售商的最爱宣布它从一项股票出售计划中获得了近 10 亿美元的收入。【原文：GameStop Corp. shares rallied in late trading after the retail trader favorite announced it brought in nearly $1 billion from a share sale program.】

item.title: 四年来基金最看好黄金价格，价格创下历史新高
item.description: 本周早些时候，随着黄金价格飙升至新纪录，货币经理们成为四年多来最看好黄金的人。【原文：Money managers became the most bullish on gold in more than four years as prices surged to a fresh record earlier this week.】

item.title: 中国恐惧笼罩七国集团，草案对 "有害 "贸易发出警报
item.description: 中国在世界贸易中扮演的角色越来越大，这让全球财政首脑们感到震惊，他们准备在意大利结成统一战线，向本国的 "有害做法 "发起挑战。【原文：China’s outsized role in world trade is alarming global finance chiefs, who are poised to forge a united front in Italy priming their nations to challenge “harmful practices.”】

item.title: 蒙特利尔银行任命 Jespersen 为债务资本市场主管
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，蒙特利尔银行任命布莱克-杰斯珀森（Blake Jespersen）为债务资本市场主管，理查德-西伯索普（Richard Sibthorpe）在领导该部门十年后将于 6 月底卸任。【原文：Bank of Montreal appointed Blake Jespersen as head of debt capital markets, with Richard Sibthorpe stepping down at the end of June after a decade leading the unit, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 加纳贸易顺差仍面临可可产量低的压力
item.description: 由于可可出口收入下降，加纳前四个月的贸易顺差缩小。【原文：Ghana’s trade surplus narrowed in the first four months after revenue from cocoa exports declined.】

item.title: 杰富瑞提高资本缓冲，以应对任何 T+1 故障
item.description: 杰富瑞金融集团公司（Jefferies Financial Group Inc.【原文：Jefferies Financial Group Inc.’s roughly $3 billion of debt sales last month were partly used to prepare for potential glitches when revamped trading rules take effect next week.】

item.title: 道富希望撼动 401（k）计划的世界
item.description:
SSGA的安娜-帕格里亚（Anna Paglia）称赞ETF包装的优势。【原文：

SSGA’s Anna Paglia touts the strength of the ETF wrapper.

】

item.title: 奇趣通讯三个 C 大事不妙
item.description: 您好，欢迎阅读《奇货》周刊，乔-魏森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）将为您带来他们对市场、金融和经济领域最有趣发展的看法。【原文：Hello and welcome to the weekly Odd Lots newsletter, where Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway bring you their thoughts on the most interesting developments in markets, finance and the economy.】

item.title: Rite Aid 向债权人保证将度过破产保护期
item.description: Rite Aid 公司的法律团队试图向债权人保证，这家破产的连锁药店将在破产保护程序中存活下来，并表示该公司仍在与银行和一个重要的债券持有人团体就一项救援协议进行合作，该协议的最终敲定所花费的时间比预期的要长。【原文：Rite Aid Corp.’s legal team sought to reassure creditors that the bankrupt pharmacy chain will survive Chapter 11, saying the company is still working with banks and a key bondholder group on a rescue deal that has taken longer than expected to finalize.】

item.title: 荷兰银行是继供应商遭黑客攻击后最新一家遭遇信息泄露的银行
item.description: 荷兰银行（ABN Amro Bank NV）成为最新一家因其供应商而遭受数据泄露的欧洲贷款机构，因为犯罪分子试图利用与银行业务相邻的薄弱环节。【原文：ABN Amro Bank NV became the latest European lender to suffer a data breach through one of its suppliers as criminals seek to exploit weaker links adjacent to banking.】

item.title: 俄罗斯资产对乌克兰的援助在七国集团草案中取得进展
item.description: 根据七国集团财长将于周六签署的公报草案，七国集团财长将为利用俄罗斯被冻结资产的利润来帮助乌克兰奠定基础。【原文：Group of Seven finance ministers will lay the groundwork for using the profits from frozen Russia assets to help Ukraine, according a draft of the communique that they’re set to sign off on Saturday.】

item.title: 速汇金错过 3.98 亿美元杠杆贷款交易的最后期限
item.description: 据知情人士透露，速汇金国际公司（MoneyGram International Inc.【原文：MoneyGram International Inc. failed to convince lenders to slash its borrowing costs on a leveraged loan before a deadline Thursday, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 梅洛尼在推动改革时将意大利的不稳定归咎于债务过高
item.description: 乔治亚-梅洛尼将意大利的巨额债务与其政府不稳定的历史联系在一起，这预示着她将如何在未来的全民公决中为像她这样的总理争取更有力的授权。【原文：Giorgia Meloni linked Italy’s mammoth debt to its history of unstable governments, a preview of how she will argue in a future referendum for premiers such as herself to get a stronger mandate.】

item.title: 受供应浪潮影响，债券创 2020 年 3 月以来最差一周
item.description: 随着美国各州和城市的债务受到大量发行债券的冲击，4 万亿美元的市政债券市场正在结束自 2020 年初以来最糟糕的一周。【原文：The $4 trillion municipal bond market is wrapping up its worst week since early 2020 as an onslaught of issuance weighs on the debt of US states and cities.】

item.title: 英国皇家邮政业主在欢迎收购要约后报告亏损
item.description: 在欢迎捷克亿万富翁丹尼尔-克里廷斯基（Daniel Kretinsky）出价 35 亿英镑（45 亿美元）收购英国皇家邮政几天后，陷入困境的英国皇家邮政所有者再次报告年度亏损。【原文：The embattled owner of Britain’s Royal Mail reported another annual loss, days after welcoming a £3.5 billion ($4.5 billion) bid from Czech billionaire Daniel Kretinsky.】

item.title: 据说 Waystar 计划最快周二启动 9.5 亿美元的首次公开募股
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，医疗支付软件公司 Waystar Holding Corp. 正在推进美国首次公开募股计划，预计最快将于周二启动。【原文：Health-care payments software firm Waystar Holding Corp. is moving ahead with a planned US initial public offering that’s expected to launch as soon as Tuesday, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 神田称日本将对过度外汇交易采取适当措施
item.description: 日本最高货币官员神田正人（Masato Kanda）重申了采取适当措施防止货币过度波动的立场。【原文：Japan’s top currency official Masato Kanda reiterates his stance to take appropriate steps against excessive currency moves.】
